title: Sent to auction please delete Chase Piedmont Factory 42
author: Orions father

posts.post_title: Sent to auction please delete Chase Piedmont Factory 42
posts.post_content:
OFF TO Auction Please DELETE One of my favorite cards but it has to go. A very hard to find 1911 T206 Hal Chase Piedmont 460 Factory 42 PSA 4.  Please let me know if you have any questions. 
David
